title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Jimmy Garoppolo struggled against the Broncos and why we should have seen it coming. He believes in Lamar Jackson and is not worried about any potential injuries as a mobile QB. He also paints a clear picture for Bill Belichick and why he has struggled since Tom Brady's departure. Plus, Joel Klatt from FOX Sports joins the show in studio to defend Texas as an elite program after losing to Texas Tech. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
